title: Exfolia Microexfoliation Beauty Cloth
description: This high-tech, patented cloth exfoliates dead skin cells precisely and quickly without chemicals, acids or machines. Nano-scale fibers scoop and remove dead skin cells without intrusion or damage to the lower layers of the epidermis. Remove makeup, clean, and exfoliate facial skin - in one simple step! This safe, home exfoliation method produces results that are safer and often superior to expensive clinic treatments.Try the `1 Minute Test` for a Beautiful Skin Surprise:1. Rinse Beauty Cloth Exfolia with warm water.2. Add your favorite cleanser & wash one cheek with Beauty Cloth Exfolia with no more 10 gentle strokes.3. Wash the other cheek as you normally do & rinse.4. Towel dry and compare cheeks - feel the amazing improvement in smoothness!Exfolia is a safe, sensible and natural way to get cleaner, healthier, smoother, glowing skin. It will boost the performance of your moisturizers, toners, creams, serums, acne formulas, and self tans because it helps you start with the cleanest skin possible. Beauty Cloth Exfolia is washable and lasts for 60 to 80 treatments - a terrific value. It is appropriate for use with all skin types.

title: Shea Terra Organics Rose Water Ester-C Collagen Regeneration Facial Mist
description:
With one swift spritz of our Moroccan Rose Water Ester C Facial Mist, you'll luxuriate your skin and bathe yourself in a sea of silky roses. 17th century herbalist, Nicholas Culpeper, used red roses to strengthen the heart, for cooling and astringent benefits to the skin, and to soothe headaches and tired eyes. Our mist immerses you in beautifully fragrant Moroccan rose water distilled from the best damask roses, to heal and tone while improving circulation. Ester C stimulates cell renewal, promotes collagen, improves skin tone and elasticity, as well as lightens dark spots. Calm, hydrate and renew your skin with our sensual facial mist. Treat yourself to the absolute finest. 

Most vitamin C products are made with degradable vitamin C. Although they are promoted to assist skin collagen they actually do more harm than good. Ester-C company, famous for their highly digestible internal vitamin formulas, has used the same technology to develop a topical form of Ester-C which remains stable in skin care applications. May feel a burning sensation when using Ester-C. Varies for skin type.

title: COQ10, Hyaluronic Acid, Matrixyl 3000 and Argireline Cell Repair Concentrate Serum..Boost Collagen, Repair Cells, Tighten and Smooth Wrinkles
description:
Active Cell Repair is a highly concentrated serum that packs a punch against aging. This ultimate formula contains the highest quality ingredients that are clinically proven to tighten, plump and diminish lines and wrinkles. The active ingredients will stimulate Collagen production while promoting new skin cells giving you a radiant youthful tone. Active cell is also proven to prevent aging by protecting the matrix of the skin from the everyday free radicals that directly cause signs of premature aging, dark spots and photo damage. This concentrate is all natural and highly concentrated so a small amount will go a long way. This product is also available in our extra large 4oz pump.

This product is chock full of natural essentials such as retinyls, vitamins A, B's, C, E plus citrus extracts none of which are attributed to acne, reactions or irritation in NORMAL skin  types.  If you have a history of acne and dermal irritations you should always check every listed ingredient and follow the directions for use.
